td.content: s:pt presents with increased critical coughing, critical malaise, critical very high fever and Blood over 7 months. pt is a white female illustrator aged 55 years. consumes more than 4 alcoholic drinks daily Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 157 cm, Weight 80.4 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, Bone marrow biopsy shows hypercellularity with elevated myeloid to erythroid ratio a:Leukemia p:administered nilotinib - 400 mg 2xday, performed Bone marrow biopsy, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

s:patient presents with increased critical very high fever, critical coughing and critical malaise over 3 years. patient is a female illustrator aged 56 Ys. she drinks alcohol heavily for the past 2 years she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life o:Height 157 cm, Weight 79.2 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16, Bone marrow biopsy shows hypercellularity with elevated myeloid to erythroid ratio a:Leukemia p:administered imatinib - 400 mg daily, performed Bone marrow biopsy, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
